tp:docstring.p: This codec offer interface provides a method of signalling support for RTP Header Extensions, documented by A General Mechanism for RTP Header Extensions (RFC 5285).
Handlers should call SetLocalHeaderExtensions just before calling CodecOffer.DRAFT.Accept.

If the remote contact codecs are already known (by examining the CodecOffer.DRAFT.RemoteContactCodecs property) and the codec offer has the RTPHeaderExtensions.DRAFT interface, then the RemoteHeaderExtensions property may contain useful details about what RTP Header Extensions the remote contact supports.
For more details on the General Mechanism for RTP Header Extensions and how to use then, one should refer to RFC 5285.

tp:struct.name: RTP_Header_Extension
tp:struct.tp:docstring: A struct defining a RTP Header extension

tp:member.name: Direction
tp:member.tp:docstring: Direction in which the Header Extension is negotiated.

tp:member.name: Parameters
tp:member.tp:docstring: Feedback parameters as a string. Format is defined in the relevant RFC

method.name: SetLocalHeaderExtensions
method.tp:docstring: Sets the LocalHeaderExtensions property. This method should be called just before calling CodecOffer.DRAFT.Accept.

property.name: LocalHeaderExtensions
property.tp:docstring: A lost of local header extensions which have been set using the SetLocalHeaderExtensions method.

property.name: RemoteHeaderExtensions
property.tp:docstring: A lost of remote header extensions which have been set by the CM.
